abstract: month-by-month rev, map showing 15 outstanding events
snippet: MELBOURNE, Australia. WHILE the war has wrecked  musical Europe, it has created the greatest boom in serious music Australia  has ever known. Music in the Commonwealth has still to recover from the loss of Verbrugghen nearly twenty years ago....

headline.main: TONAL REVIVAL IN AUSTRALIA; War Stimulates Boom and Varied Activity Down Under

lead_paragraph: MELBOURNE, Australia. WHILE the war has wrecked musical Europe, it has created the greatest boom in serious music Australia has ever known. Music in the Commonwealth has still to recover from the loss of Verbrugghen nearly twenty years ago.
